sentences.sentence: I'm not so sure being in the same place is the same as being friends.
sentences.translation: 我不认为在一起生活就等同是朋友。

sentences.sentence: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
sentences.translation: 一个从不犯错误的人，一定从来没有尝试过任何新鲜事物。

sentences.sentence: Never twist yourself just to please the world.
sentences.translation: 永远不要为了讨好这个世界，而扭曲了自己。

sentences.sentence: Choose to live a life that matters!
